articles.title: Tata Technologies IPO: How to check share allotment status, GMP, listing date and more - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Shares of Tata Technologies were trading at a premium of ₹414 in the grey market today, compared to its issue price of ₹500 apiece. The hefty premium in the unlisted market is suggesting a listing pop of over 80%.
